application.name: Calibre
application.summary: E-book library management: Convert, view, share, catalogue all your e-books

description.p: Calibre is used to manage a collections of e-books in many popular formats. Books may be viewed, or converted between e-pub, MOBI, and similar formats. Searching by author, title, other metadata, and user defined characteristics is possible.
This is one of the most versatile and feature-full e-book viewers.
